임시폰트: https://www.whatfontis.com/CR_Mind-Font-Regular-otf-400.font

배경이미지
비: https://pixabay.com/images/id-1461288/

=============================

아이콘

=============================
음악
빗소리: https://pixabay.com/ko/sound-effects/relaxing-rain-8228/
